(Program 
  (Statement 
    (ExpressionStatement 
      (SequenceExpression 
        (Expression 
          (AssignmentExpression 
            (Identifier "a") 
            (Expression 
              (Number "1")))) 
        (Expression 
          (AssignmentExpression 
            (Identifier "b") 
            (Expression 
              (Number "2"))))))))
